content.question: In the poem, subtle allusions to idiomatic expressions, such as “bulls in china” (line 3) and “A wrench in clocks” (line 13), mainly serve to

choices.label: highlight the severity of the beloved’s shortcomings
disclose a secret between the speaker and his beloved
echo language typically found in classical love poetry
satirize the artificiality of dated turns of phrase

content.answer: highlight the severity of the beloved’s shortcomings

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
